title: Opinion: New medical technology presents hospitals with a prisoner’s dilemma
description: Hospitals may be the “prisoners” in the dilemma, but the “punishment” is borne by the public.
content: Hospitals may be the “prisoners” in the dilemma, but the “punishment” is borne by the public.
